title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
This role involves launching and scaling direct-response ads that convert. You will optimize campaign structures, test creatives, and scale winners across Meta and Google ad networks.

Requirements:

1 year or more experience in paid acquisition

Deep understanding of user journeys and funnel strategies

Proficiency with platform analytics and performance reporting

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
